meanings.definition: The state or quality of being easily seen or noticed.
meanings.sent1: The bright colors of the flowers added to the conspicuousnesses of the garden.
meanings.sent2: Her flashy outfit increased her conspicuousnesses at the party.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel's attempt to hide the acorn only increased its conspicuousnesses.
meanings.sent4: The towering skyscraper's conspicuousnesses dominated the city skyline.
meanings.sent5: The loud music drew attention to the conspicuousnesses of the event.

meanings.definition: The act of standing out or being prominent.
meanings.sent1: The singer's unique voice gave her a sense of conspicuousnesses on stage.
meanings.sent2: The logo's design ensured its conspicuousnesses on the product packaging.
meanings.sent3: The clown's attempt to blend in only heightened his conspicuousnesses at the party.
meanings.sent4: The leader's charisma and confidence added to his conspicuousnesses in the group.
meanings.sent5: The bright spotlight emphasized the conspicuousnesses of the actor during the performance.
